ygData.subject: Re: Lullaby
ygData.msgSnippet: I am completely negative about it.  I do believe that no matter how many tests you do Verant is going to quietly ignore it.  Same with the shaman post in the
ygData.messageBody:
I am completely negative about it. I do believe that no matter how many
tests you do Verant is going to quietly ignore it. Same with the shaman
post in the EQ forum that ran tests on AGI, DEX and the like. Gord-o asked
them to run the test, yet that post has been ignored. All the man has to
do is reply to it with at least a simple, "ok, thanks for running the test
for me. We'll look in to it.". I personally feel that Gord-o has turned
in to more of a corporate man recently, not a person for the people. All
these posts about problems are getting bumped while he is busy responding
to posts about the history or Norrath. Grrrr

-Steve


At 09:29 AM 2/16/00 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Peck White <PWhite@...>
>
>Well, John's post on the EQ boards concerning Lullaby now has 5+ pages of
>bumps and has remained at the top of the boards. Yet there has still been
>no response from Abashi or GZ. It is my hope that they are secretly going
>to de-nerf it in tomorrow mornings patch without ever admitting that there
>was a problem. Am I a wild-eyed optimist?
>
>Tomerrilin Loreweaver
